response.overview: Herman (Rachmat Hidayat), who has gone blind, has been forced to live in a retirement home, by his younger second wife, Lisa (Ully Artha). The efforts of the retirement homeâ€™s management to find his family bear fruit. Mirah (Nani Somanegara), his first wife, who makes a living for her children from a shop in her house, acknowledges that he is her husband. Anton (Gusti Randa) attempts to bring his family, which has long been estranged, back together again. However, Victor (Asrul Zulmi), his oldest brother, a successful businessman, refuses. He hates his father. However, once the past is revealed clearly, this family finds peace together.
response.title: Potret
